snippet: Yankees Manager Joe Girardi said Derek Jeter experienced tightness in his right quadriceps against Boston on Friday, so he was giving Jeter three days off as a precaution.
lead_paragraph: Yankees Manager Joe Girardi said Derek Jeter experienced tightness in his right quadriceps against Boston on Friday, so he was giving Jeter three days off as a precaution.

headline.main: Tightness in Jeter’s Leg Keeps Him Out for Second Game in a Row
headline.print_headline: Tightness in Jeter’s Leg Keeps Him Out for Second Game in a Row
